attributes.action: stop the closure of castleway school in leasowe wirral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: castleway school is a small primary school in the heart of the leasowe estate on the wirral. it is being threatened with closure  by the borough council.this school is the hub of the community and most of the pupils who attend this school parents also attended castleway as well. the school has a few empty places according to a recent council review although another school on the estate has more . although it had an average offsted report the other school has not had one but is cosidered by the parents as the worse of the two schools . castleway has two safe access routes to the school and most pupils can walk to school without crossing any major roads were as the other one is on a busy main road . castleway is a thriving primary school being made to suffer because of a few empty spaces compared to the other school.most pupils will have to travel a longway to a new school should castleway close. so please PM help save castleway school.
